title: Return the Locket
content:
Return the Locket Type Quest Act Act 1 Location Druid Grove Reward 15 XP, 6-7 gold to each party member, favor of some persons from a party, for example, Shadowheart. Wyll doesn't.

Return the Locket

Return the Locket is a Quest in Baldur's Gate 3. Return the Locket can be acquired during Act 1 and begins in Druid Grove. Completing Quests allows players to learn more about the world and characters in Baldur's Gate 3, as well as earning more loot and experience to become more powerful.
